sentences.sContent: The editor killed a few useless lines.
sentences.sContent_eng: The editor killed a few useless lines.
sentences.sCn: 编辑删掉了几行无用的文字。

sentences.sContent: Please cancel the words which are useless.
sentences.sContent_eng: Please cancel the words which are useless.

sentences.sContent: They wrote his suggestion off as a useless idea.
sentences.sContent_eng: They wrote his suggestion off as a useless idea.
sentences.sCn: 他们把他的建议看做是无用的想法。
